strings: The statue's eyes are set with a pair of beautiful, shimmering jewels.
<voice_0x01000A31><se_high>Jessica: You!
<voice_0x01000A32><se_high>Jessica: I knew you'd be back for the jewels!

<voice_0x01000A33><se_high>Jessica: You killed my brother!
Now you'll suffer the same fate!

<voice_0x01000A34><se_high>Jessica: You're fast!
I guess thieves need to be quick on their toes!
But you won't get away from me this time!
<voice_0x01000A35><se_high>Jessica: Prepare...to...
<voice_0x01000A36><se_def><center>...Wait!

<voice_0x01000A37><se_def><center>Jessica. It's me!
<center>Don't you recognise my voice?
<voice_0x01000A38><se_high>Jessica: A-Alistair!?

<voice_0x01000A39><se_def><center>Stay your spell, Jessica!
<center>I wasn't slain at their hands.
<voice_0x01000A3A><se_high>Jessica: Stay my spell!?
<voice_0x01000A3B><se_high>Jessica: But it's too late!

<voice_0x01000A3C><se_high>Jessica: Alistair! Alistair!
Is that really you?

<voice_0x01000A3D><se_def><center>It's me, Jess.
<center>You...have to listen to me.
<center>As do you travellers...

<voice_0x01000A3E><se_def><center>After I died, a part of my soul...
<center>was allowed to linger in this statue.

<voice_0x01000A3F><se_def><center>Even now as I speak to you...
<center>The power keeping me here begins to evaporate...
<center>Time is short...

<voice_0x01000A40><se_def><center>Look into the statue's eyes...
<center>The truth lies within...
<center>Hurry...

<voice_0x01000A41><se_def><center>The day I died, the door to the tower
<center>was already open. I thought it was strange.
<center>So I decided to look around and see for myself.
<voice_0x01000A42><se_def><center>That's when I saw him.
<voice_0x01000A43><se_def>Alistair: Who are you?
<voice_0x01000A44><se_def>*: Such a pity.

<voice_0x01000A45><se_def>Alistair: Pity...!?
What are you talking about?
Who are you? Answer me!
<voice_0x01000A46><se_def>*: Me? I am Dhoulmagus. And I was referring to the fragility of human life.

<voice_0x01000A47><se_def>Alistair: Fragility?
What do you mean!?

<voice_0x01000A48><se_def>Alistair: My... My sword!
I, I can't draw my sword!

<voice_0x01000A49><se_def>Dhoulmagus: I said: such a pity. A terrible pity that a
shining young star like you should chance
to encounter me.

<voice_0x01000A4A><se_def>Alistair: Ngggh!
What have you done...to...me...?

<voice_0x01000A4B><se_def>Alistair: Dhoulmagus...!
I won't...forget this!

<voice_0x01000A4C><se_def>Dhoulmagus: What? You won't forget my name?
You're too kind!

<voice_0x01000A4D><se_def>Dhoulmagus: I shall return the favour,
and remember yours as well.

<voice_0x01000A4E><se_def>Dhoulmagus: Now.
Let us finish this before I feel any more pity...
<voice_0x01000A4F><se_def>Alistair: DHOULMAGUS!!!
<voice_0x01000A50>Dhoulmagus: .........
<voice_0x01000A51><se_def>Dhoulmagus: It has been an honour making your acquaintance.

<voice_0x01000A52><se_def>Dhoulmagus: You may rest assured, your death will not be
in vain.
<voice_0x01000A53>Dhoulmagus: ......
<voice_0x01000A54><se_def>Dhoulmagus: Ha ha ha!
<voice_0x01000A55><se_def>Dhoulmagus: Mua ha ha ha! HA HA HA HA! AH HA HA HA!

<voice_0x01000A56><se_def><center>And now you have seen what the statue saw,
<center>my travelling friends.

<voice_0x01000A57><se_def><center>I don't understand it myself.
<center>But it seems the Statue of Alexandra
<center>has been awaiting your arrival.

<voice_0x01000A58><se_def><center>If the memory of my tale
<center>can serve you on your quest,
<center>it would bring great relief to my soul...

<voice_0x01000A59><se_def><center>My stay here is coming to an end.
<center>It's time for us to part...

<voice_0x01000A5A><se_high>Jessica: No! Alistair!
Don't leave me!
<voice_0x01000A5B><se_def><center>One final thing, Jess...

<voice_0x01000A5C><se_def><center>Mother may try to stand in your way.
<center>Nevertheless...

<voice_0x01000A5D><se_def><center>Follow your heart,
<center>and do as you must.
<center>Farewell, my little sister...
<voice_0x01000A5E><se_low>King Trode: What a tragic affair.

<voice_0x01000A5F><se_low>King Trode: There can be no question.
This is Dhoulmagus's treachery!

<voice_0x01000A60><se_low>Yangus: COR BLIMEY, GRANDAD,
where d'you spring from?
<voice_0x01000A61><se_low>King Trode: I saw everything.

<voice_0x01000A5F><se_low>King Trode: There can be no question.
This is Dhoulmagus's treachery!
<voice_0x01000A62><se_low>King Trode: It would appear that Alistair also wishes us to bring Dhoulmagus to justice.
<voice_0x01000A63><se_low>King Trode: His sacrifice shall not be in vain.
<voice_0x01000A64><se_low>King Trode: Now we have yet another reason to stop Dhoulmagus's foul reign of terror...
<voice_0x01000A65><se_low>King Trode: I shall await you by the carriage.
<voice_0x01000A66><se_low>King Trode: Cheerio!
